name: Making History
description:
Adventure game about a caveman trying to fit in a new tribe after being pulled by a strong river current.

This game was as part of the evaluation in the course of Videojogos(Videogames) at Universidade Lusófona de Humanidades e Tecnologias in Lisbon,Portugal.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • MOUSE - Control Camera
  • E - Interact With NPCs or Objects
  • SPACE - Choose dialogue option and advance in dialogue
  • ESCAPE - Pause

Note: Save and Load are not currently implemented. Pressing those buttons won't do anything.
